N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2700.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) The records access officer is designated the fiscal officer who shall certify
the payroll and respond to requests, in accordance with section
2700.7
(b) of this

Part, for an itemized record setting forth the name, address, title and salary
of every officer or employee of the board. (b) The fiscal officer shall make the payroll
items listed above available to any person including bona fide members of the
news media as required under section 88(1)(g), (1)(i), and (10) of the Freedom
of Information Law. Notes
